title: WILL A TANK BE EASIER TO KILL TEEMO?
body: Tank have lots of health so no matter how many  mushrooms  a tank got traped tank can still survive in the chase.

replies.body:
please don't pick Yi he won't work yes 2.5 attacks per second is good but if your blinded your attacks will miss so teemo will  just poison you till you die. you might get 1 hit on him and a q
and meditation won't do crap since {{item:3151}} makes your hp Regen down to 50%

No...  But yes Morellonomicon would still work...

Sorry I stand corrected as I did some research and yes you are right I did mean Morellonomicon.({{item:3165}})

I'm confused, because Liandry doesn't affect hp regen, and is based on total HP, so it usually does more or less.

Unless you're exaggerating. Then nevermind I just noticed...

I thought when I wrote my sentence. "and meditation won't do crap since {{item:3151}}" makes your hp Regen down to 50%."
I thought {{item:3151}} was Morellonomicon. But {{item:3151}} doesn't deal "Grievous Wounds".
"Grievous Wounds" lowers hp regen by 50% (2 items that I know of only apply "Grievous Wounds" which are {{summoner:14}} and {{item:3165}})
(If there is anymore you can write them down below. but I don't honestly care)
The trick is ... to buy mr ....

No because a smart Teemo will simply buy {{item:3151}}, this item is already semi-core on Teemo anyway. The item can melt tanks super fast if they try to chase. Tanks also typically can't deal enough damage to kill of a smart Teemo. 

I think the best way to kill off a Teemo is to 100-0 one. In other words, pick assassins. Don't step on his shrooms and buy {{item:3364}} and {{item:3362}} {{item:2043}}.

Definitely agree with this, as someone who plays Teemo a lot the worst thing is a good assassin on the other team. Tanks can kill Teemo if they have a good gap closer and can stick, but a good Teemo should be able to get away (bushes, shrooms) or not get too close in the first place. 

I think also everyone is saying "build MR" but check what the Teemo is building first. 

Void staff counters MR: Teemo builds Void, you build Health. 
Liandrys counters Health: Teemo builds Liandrys, you build MR. 

Void is also core on Teemo (he scales on MPen, not AP).

Just pick Olaf, run through 300 shrooms killing all allies following you and E him a few times then throw Axes at him, pop youmuu's, QSS, flash Ignite chase after him furtherly throwing axes at him then die, throw your keyboard at your screen and afk like everyone else does when they face this rat p.o.s.

http://apollo-uploads-oce.s3.amazonaws.com/1437847312/images.jpg

R.I.P All teemos you will not be missed in the 1 game out of ten you do die.

Depends on the tank.

If the tank has a gap close and doesn't rely heavilly on AA's then yeah it will work fine.

Again make sure to fight on your terms when his on CD's, and get your sweeper upgrade and pinks.
